name: Starmadillo
description:
Starmadillo is a first-person 3D single-player puzzle-platflormer. The player, Alex, wakes up shrunken down to a couple inches tall in their childhood bedroom. They meet their old childhood friend Arnold the Starmadillo who has some mysterious powers. Alex realizes that these powers are the ones she have Arnold as a child. Alex familiarizes themselves with their old friend and begins to learn more about their abilities and their surroundings as they adventure shrunken down around their old bedroom. 

Credit: Olivia, Via, Peter, Jack
